name: Peaky Knives
description:
Throw the Peaky Knives at the targets and smash them! Be like a Ninja - throw the knives as fast as you can! Hit precisely at the target to get a perfect shot and additional score.

And be careful not to run out of the knives or out of time.

Progress through the levels and visit new places.

Complete the challenges to unlock new unique and interesting knives.
